title: Tyrndamere or Mordekaiser
body: I have enough for one...Just want to know which one should i buy?

replies.body: Both are easy enough to play as long as you are willing to fiddle with a build for a bit.  Morde is my fav so I'm a bit biased towards him since I love the playstyle and theme.
Thanks for your feedback! I'm just going to wait until I have a total of at least 5...
Cool.  Give me a yell if you need some basic tips for Morde.  He can be unforgiving early game until you get a feel for him.
